text: Terrence Alan Crews (born July 30, 1968) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, voice artist, and comedian. He is known for appearing in Everybody Hates Chris, The Expendables, White Chicks, The 6th Day, Norbit, Brooklyn Nine-Nine, and other movies and television series. He is a retired NFL player. Crews is from Flint, Michigan. Crews was the host of Who Wants to be a Millionaire on September 2014 until May 2015 due to his busy schedule. He was replaced by Chris Harrison in September 2015. == Early life and education == Terrence Alan Crews grew up in a strict Christian household in Flint. His mother raised him, because his father was an alcoholic. His great aunt gave him a flute, so Terrence took lessons for eight years. He played football at Western Michigan University (WMU) in Kalamazoo, Michigan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * * BET Shows - The Family Crews Website * Squeegee Lo Website * NFL stats at Databasefootball.com * Terry Crews reality show - The Family Crews Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:African-American actors Category:African-American comedians Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Michigan Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:Washington Redskins players Category:Sportspeople from Michigan Category:Actors from Flint, Michigan
title: Terry Crews
